text:
Hey everyone!

If u have a branch where u either have objects go down Path A or Path B?
Do you filter two branches and leave the "None met" one open( even tho its not possible for the none met to ever be taken) like in the picture

Or do you just filter for one branch for example: "is known" and let the other branch just be default "none met"?

Just a silly question! There is probably no difference to it, but if so if someone can share their insights with me if there is a difference to it i would greatly appreciate it! :slightly_smiling_face:
Can you not set a dropdown value, by the value of a string of a custom code action?
